BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'{CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW SPF_T_PAUDITMAINEJ AS SELECT spf_v_pauditmain.FIRAGENCYID AS FIRAGENCYID,spf_v_pauditmain.SPFNAME AS SPFNAME,spf_v_pauditmain.PROJGROUP_NAME AS PROJGROUP_NAME,spf_v_pauditmain.PROJNAME AS PROJNAME,spf_v_pauditmain.PROJCODE AS PROJCODE,spf_v_pauditmain.AGENCYID AS AGENCYID,spf_v_pauditmain.AGENCYNAME AS AGENCYNAME,spf_v_pauditmain.DISTRICTID AS DISTRICTID,spf_v_pauditmain.UPSTATUS AS UPSTATUS,spf_v_pauditmain.UPTIME AS UPTIME,spf_v_pauditmain.EXPFUNCID AS EXPFUNCID,spf_v_pauditmain.CREATEUSER AS CREATEUSER,spf_v_pauditmain.CREATETIME AS CREATETIME,spf_v_pauditmain.PROJAUDITINGSTATUS AS PROJAUDITINGSTATUS,spf_v_pauditmain.ISBGT AS ISBGT,spf_v_pauditmain.CHECKSTATUS AS CHECKSTATUS,spf_v_pauditmain.IMPORTANCE AS IMPORTANCE,spf_v_pauditmain.ISTEMP AS ISTEMP,spf_v_pauditmain.SPFID AS SPFID,spf_v_pauditmain.PROJECTID AS PROJECTID,spf_v_pauditmain.PROJTYPEID AS PROJTYPEID,spf_v_pauditmain.ISINSTEAD AS ISINSTEAD,spf_v_pauditmain.REPORTAGENCY AS REPORTAGENCY,spf_v_pauditmain.FUNDLEVEL AS FUNDLEVEL,spf_v_pauditmain.DATAKEY AS DATAKEY,spf_v_pauditmain.TEMPUPTIME AS TEMPUPTIME,spf_v_pauditmain.TEMPUPSTATUS AS TEMPUPSTATUS,spf_v_pauditmain.TEMPDEPTID AS TEMPDEPTID,spf_v_pauditmain.TEMPFIRAGENCYID AS TEMPFIRAGENCYID,spf_v_pauditmain.TEMPCHECKSTATUS AS TEMPCHECKSTATUS, STATUS, DBVERSION FROM SPF_V_PAUDITMAIN spf_v_pauditmain WHERE PROJTYPEID IN (SELECT PROJTYPEID FROM SPF_T_PROJECTTYPE START WITH PROJTYPE in ( '2','9') CONNECT BY PRIOR PROJTYPEID = SUPERID)}'; END;

BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'{CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW KPI_V_DEPEXPTARGET AS SELECT a.NAME || '{' || a.guid group_deptname, a.guid datakey, a.guid bpmnid, a.guid departmentid, --部门 a.code deptcode, b.code distcode, b.guid districtid --地区 FROM code_m_department a INNER JOIN code_t_district b ON a.districtid = b.guid WHERE a.YEAR = global_multyear_cz.Secu_f_global_parm('YEAR') AND a.iscz = '0' ORDER BY b.code, a.code}'; END;

BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'{CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW KPI_V_FNCEXPTARGET AS SELECT '' needupdate, '' finyear, '' orderid, c.guid datakey, c.guid distinctid, c.code, c.province_sh, c.city, c.county FROM code_t_district_spf c ORDER BY c.code}'; END;

BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'{CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW KPI_V_PMAIN AS SELECT a.datakey datakey, a.agencyid, f.firagencyid, f.deptid, a.spfid, a.projtypeid, a.projectid, a.projcode, a.projname projname, a.projname || '{' || a.projectid projgroup_name, a.districtid, f.expfuncid, a.iszd FROM spf_t_pbaseinfo a INNER JOIN spf_t_fbaseinfo f ON a.spfid = f.spfid}'; END;

BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'{CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW BGT_T_YSJZSJB_INDI AS SELECT DATAKEY, GUID, NEEDUPDATE, ORDERID, FINYEAR, case when nvl((select 1 from code_t_dept_spf f where f.guid = AGENCYGUID), 0) = 1 then '' else AGENCYGUID end AS AGENCYGUID, PROGUID, AGENCYEXPGUID, EXPFUNCGUID, EXPECOGUID, FININTORGGUID, PURITEMGUID, GPPSITEMGUID, FUNDTYPEGUID, WH, BGTSOURCEGUID, LOCINCSTRGUID, XMBM, INCOMESORTGUID, LOCEXPSTRGUID, BGTTYPEGUID, AMT, SFJZ, STATUS, TASKID, case when nvl((select 1 from FASP_T_PUBPROVINCE f where f.guid = AGENCYGUID), 0) = 1 then '1' else '0' end AS ISDISTRICT, SJZYZFXM as TRAPORJ FROM P#BGT_T_YSJZSJB a WHERE YEAR = GLOBAL_MULTYEAR_CZ.SECU_F_GLOBAL_PARM('YEAR') AND PROVINCE = GLOBAL_MULTYEAR_CZ.SECU_F_GLOBAL_PARM('DIVID') AND STATUS = '1'}'; END;

BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'{CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW BGT_T_ZCXMMXB AS SELECT DBVERSION, STATUS, DWLX, YSDWZCJG, EJXMFL, XMDM, SPFID, BATCHID, ESTID, AGENCYID, DATAKEY, FINYEAR, ORDERID, NEEDUPDATE, PROJTYPEID, MJ, BOOLGUID, BOOLGUIDSF, SFGKZXZDXM, SFZXZXHHSP, BUDGETNUM, CSJE, DZJE, PROJECTNAME, ZFYSZJLYHJ, BJSRAP, FHXSR, YBXZYZFSR, ZXZYZFSR, XJSJSR, DRZJ, JSQTDQYZSR, DRYSWDDJJJ, ZDDFZFZQSR, DFZFZQSR, JIEZHUAN, JINJY, LEVELNO, ISLEAF, SUPERGUID, PROJECTID, EXPECOID, EXPFUNCID, ZCHJ, CZBKBZXJ, GGCZBKBZ, NRYSGLDFSSR, QZNRZHGLDJYSFS, SYDWJYSR, QTSR, SJDWBZSR, FSDWSJSR, SNJZ, YSYJJMBSZCE, SJZYZFXM, QTSYSR, ISADJUST, ADJUSTCOMMENT FROM P#BGT_T_ZCXMMXB P#BGT_T_ZCXMMXB WHERE STATUS = '1' AND YEAR = GLOBAL_MULTYEAR_CZ.SECU_F_GLOBAL_PARM('YEAR')}'; END;

BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'{CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW SPF_V_COLIDATA AS SELECT AGENCYNAME, SPFNAME, AGENCYCODE, SPFID, AGENCYID, SPFCODE, FINYEAR, BUDGETNUM, PROJTYPEID, DATAID, SUPERID, LEVELNO, PROJTYPECODE, ISSPF, ORDERID, NEEDUPDATE, DATAKEY, PROJCODE, DATAFLAG, (SELECT FUNDMANAGE FROM SPF_T_FBASEINFO T WHERE T.SPFID = BGT_V_DATA.SPFID) FUNDMANAGE FROM BGT_V_DATA}'; END;

BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'/CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW SPF_V_FADJUSTMAIN AS SELECT (SELECT S.NAME FROM CODE_T_FIRAGENCY S WHERE S.GUID = A.FIRAGENCYID) FIRAGENCYNAME, A.SPFID, A.SPFNAME SPFNAME, A.SPFNAME || '{' || A.SPFID || '}' SPFGROUP_NAME, (SELECT S.NAME FROM CODE_T_SP_TYPE S WHERE S.GUID = A.PROJTYPEID) SNAME_PROJTYPEID, A.SPFCODE, A.AGENCYID, (select '[' || AGENCY.CODE || ']' || AGENCY.NAME from code_t_firagency AGENCY where a.AGENCYID = AGENCY.GUID ) AGENCYNAME, A.BEGINYEAR, A.ENDYEAR, A.EXPFUNCID, (SELECT ACCT.CODE FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF ACCT WHERE ACCT.GUID = A.EXPFUNCID) EXPFUNCCODE, (SELECT ACCT.NAME FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF ACCT WHERE ACCT.GUID = A.EXPFUNCID) EXPFUNCNAME, A.CREATETIME, A.SETUPSTATUS, A.PROJTYPEID, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.CTRLNUM, 0)) FROM SPF_T_FFOUDCONTROL B WHERE B.SPFID = A.SPFID), 0) CTRLNUMS, CASE (SELECT DISTINCT (LEVELNO) FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF T WHERE CODE LIKE '2%' AND GUID = EXPFUNCID) WHEN 3 THEN (SELECT SUPERGUID FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF WHERE GUID = EXPFUNCID) ELSE (SELECT SUPERGUID FROM CODE_T_ACCTITEM_SPF WHERE YEAR = GLOBAL_MULTYEAR_CZ.SECU_F_GLOBAL_PARM('YEAR') AND GUID = (SELECT SUPERGUID FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF WHERE GUID = EXPFUNCID)) END AS EXPFUNCID2, (SELECT V.LEICODENAME FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF V WHERE V.GUID = A.EXPFUNCID) EXPFUNCCLASS, A.FIRAGENCYID, A.DEPTID, (SELECT K.NAME FROM CODE_T_DEPT_SPF K WHERE K.GUID=A.DEPTID) AS DEPTNAME , ( SELECT C.NAME FROM FASP_T_CAUSER C WHERE C.GUID=A.CREATEUSER ) AS CREATEUSER , A.DISTRICTID, A.ISPUBSHOW, A.ISRELEASE,
A.APPROVALTYPE, A.DATAKEY, (select ADJUSTSTATUS from SPF_T_FADJUSTSTATUS where SPFID= A.SPFID) ADJUSTSTATUS, A.DBVERSION, A.STATUS FROM SPF_T_FBASEINFO A/'; END;

BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'{CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW SPF_V_FADJUSTOBJZX AS SELECT spf_v_fadjustmain.FIRAGENCYNAME AS FIRAGENCYNAME,spf_v_fadjustmain.SPFID AS SPFID,spf_v_fadjustmain.SPFNAME AS SPFNAME,spf_v_fadjustmain.SPFGROUP_NAME AS SPFGROUP_NAME,spf_v_fadjustmain.SNAME_PROJTYPEID AS SNAME_PROJTYPEID,spf_v_fadjustmain.SPFCODE AS SPFCODE,spf_v_fadjustmain.AGENCYID AS AGENCYID,spf_v_fadjustmain.AGENCYNAME AS AGENCYNAME,spf_v_fadjustmain.BEGINYEAR AS BEGINYEAR,spf_v_fadjustmain.ENDYEAR AS ENDYEAR,spf_v_fadjustmain.EXPFUNCID AS EXPFUNCID,spf_v_fadjustmain.EXPFUNCCODE AS EXPFUNCCODE,spf_v_fadjustmain.EXPFUNCNAME AS EXPFUNCNAME,spf_v_fadjustmain.CREATETIME AS CREATETIME,spf_v_fadjustmain.SETUPSTATUS AS SETUPSTATUS,spf_v_fadjustmain.PROJTYPEID AS PROJTYPEID,spf_v_fadjustmain.CTRLNUMS AS CTRLNUMS,spf_v_fadjustmain.EXPFUNCID2 AS EXPFUNCID2,spf_v_fadjustmain.EXPFUNCCLASS AS EXPFUNCCLASS,spf_v_fadjustmain.FIRAGENCYID AS FIRAGENCYID,spf_v_fadjustmain.DEPTID AS DEPTID,spf_v_fadjustmain.DEPTNAME AS DEPTNAME,spf_v_fadjustmain.CREATEUSER AS CREATEUSER,spf_v_fadjustmain.DISTRICTID AS DISTRICTID,spf_v_fadjustmain.ISPUBSHOW AS ISPUBSHOW,spf_v_fadjustmain.ISRELEASE AS ISRELEASE,spf_v_fadjustmain.APPROVALTYPE AS APPROVALTYPE,spf_v_fadjustmain.DATAKEY AS DATAKEY,spf_v_fadjustmain.ADJUSTSTATUS AS ADJUSTSTATUS, STATUS, DBVERSION FROM SPF_V_FADJUSTMAIN spf_v_fadjustmain WHERE PROJTYPEID IN (SELECT PROJTYPEID FROM SPF_T_PROJECTTYPE START WITH PROJTYPEID in ('3','9') CONNECT BY PRIOR PROJTYPEID = SUPERID)}'; END;

BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'/CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW SPF_V_FAUDITMAIN AS SELECT (SELECT S.NAME FROM CODE_T_FIRAGENCY S WHERE S.GUID = A.FIRAGENCYID) FIRAGENCYNAME, A.SPFID, A.SPFNAME SPFNAME, A.SPFNAME || '{' || A.SPFID || '}' SPFGROUP_NAME, (SELECT S.NAME FROM CODE_T_SP_TYPE S WHERE S.GUID = A.PROJTYPEID) SNAME_PROJTYPEID, A.SPFCODE, A.AGENCYID, (select '[' || AGENCY.CODE || ']' || AGENCY.NAME from code_t_firagency AGENCY where a.AGENCYID = AGENCY.GUID ) AGENCYNAME, A.BEGINYEAR, A.ENDYEAR, A.EXPFUNCID, (SELECT ACCT.CODE FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF ACCT WHERE ACCT.GUID = A.EXPFUNCID) EXPFUNCCODE, (SELECT ACCT.NAME FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF ACCT WHERE ACCT.GUID = A.EXPFUNCID) EXPFUNCNAME, A.CREATETIME, A.SETUPSTATUS, A.PROJTYPEID, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.CTRLNUM, 0)) FROM SPF_T_FFOUDCONTROL B WHERE B.SPFID = A.SPFID), 0) CTRLNUMS, CASE (SELECT DISTINCT (LEVELNO) FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF T WHERE CODE LIKE '2%' AND GUID = EXPFUNCID) WHEN 3 THEN (SELECT SUPERGUID FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF WHERE GUID = EXPFUNCID) ELSE (SELECT SUPERGUID FROM CODE_T_ACCTITEM_SPF WHERE YEAR = GLOBAL_MULTYEAR_CZ.SECU_F_GLOBAL_PARM('YEAR') AND GUID = (SELECT SUPERGUID FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF WHERE GUID = EXPFUNCID)) END AS EXPFUNCID2, (SELECT V.LEICODENAME FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF V WHERE V.GUID = A.EXPFUNCID) EXPFUNCCLASS, A.FIRAGENCYID, A.DEPTID, (select name from Code_t_Dept_Spf where guid= A.DEPTID) SNAME_DEPTID, A.DISTRICTID, A.ISPUBSHOW, A.ISRELEASE, A.APPLYPRJEFM, A.APPROVALTYPE, A.ISGROVPROC, A.FUNDLEVEL, A.ISTEMP, a.DATAKEY, A.DBVERSION, A.STATUS FROM SPF_T_FBASEINFO A/'; END;

BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'{CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW BGT_V_COLIDATA AS SELECT AGENCYNAME, SPFNAME, AGENCYCODE, SPFID, AGENCYID, SPFCODE, FINYEAR, BUDGETNUM, PROJTYPEID, DATAID, SUPERID, LEVELNO, PROJTYPECODE, ISSPF, ORDERID, NEEDUPDATE, DATAKEY, PROJCODE, DATAFLAG, (SELECT FUNDMANAGE FROM SPF_T_FBASEINFO T WHERE T.SPFID = BGT_V_DATA.SPFID) FUNDMANAGE, DBVERSION FROM BGT_V_DATA}'; END;

BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'{CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW SPF_V_FBAKLISTOBJZX AS SELECT spf_v_fbaklistmain.FIRAGENCYNAME AS FIRAGENCYNAME,spf_v_fbaklistmain.SPFID AS SPFID,spf_v_fbaklistmain.SPFNAME AS SPFNAME,spf_v_fbaklistmain.SPFGROUP_NAME AS SPFGROUP_NAME,spf_v_fbaklistmain.SNAME_PROJTYPEID AS SNAME_PROJTYPEID,spf_v_fbaklistmain.SPFCODE AS SPFCODE,spf_v_fbaklistmain.AGENCYID AS AGENCYID,spf_v_fbaklistmain.AGENCYNAME AS AGENCYNAME,spf_v_fbaklistmain.BEGINYEAR AS BEGINYEAR,spf_v_fbaklistmain.ENDYEAR AS ENDYEAR,spf_v_fbaklistmain.EXPFUNCID AS EXPFUNCID,spf_v_fbaklistmain.EXPFUNCCODE AS EXPFUNCCODE,spf_v_fbaklistmain.EXPFUNCNAME AS EXPFUNCNAME,spf_v_fbaklistmain.CREATETIME AS CREATETIME,spf_v_fbaklistmain.SETUPSTATUS AS SETUPSTATUS,spf_v_fbaklistmain.PROJTYPEID AS PROJTYPEID,spf_v_fbaklistmain.CTRLNUMS AS CTRLNUMS,spf_v_fbaklistmain.EXPFUNCID2 AS EXPFUNCID2,spf_v_fbaklistmain.EXPFUNCCLASS AS EXPFUNCCLASS,spf_v_fbaklistmain.FIRAGENCYID AS FIRAGENCYID,spf_v_fbaklistmain.DEPTID AS DEPTID,spf_v_fbaklistmain.DEPTNAME AS DEPTNAME,spf_v_fbaklistmain.CREATEUSER AS CREATEUSER,spf_v_fbaklistmain.DISTRICTID AS DISTRICTID,spf_v_fbaklistmain.ISPUBSHOW AS ISPUBSHOW,spf_v_fbaklistmain.ISRELEASE AS ISRELEASE,spf_v_fbaklistmain.APPROVALTYPE AS APPROVALTYPE,spf_v_fbaklistmain.DATAKEY AS DATAKEY, STATUS, DBVERSION FROM SPF_V_FBAKLISTMAIN spf_v_fbaklistmain WHERE PROJTYPEID IN (SELECT PROJTYPEID FROM SPF_T_PROJECTTYPE START WITH PROJTYPEID in ('3','9') CONNECT BY PRIOR PROJTYPEID = SUPERID)}'; END;

BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'{CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW SPF_V_FDECLAREREGION AS SELECT T1.CODE, '[' || T1.CODE || ']' || T1.NAME NAME, T1.GUID, B.DECLQUOTA, B.DECLTIMES, DECODE(B.DISTRICTID, T1.GUID, '1', '0') CHECKED, T1.PROVINCE_SH, T1.CITY, T1.COUNTY, B.DATAKEY, B.SPFID, T1.YEAR,T1.PROVINCE,T1.SUPERGUID,T1.ISLEAF,T1.LEVELNO FROM CODE_T_DISTRICT T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM SPF_T_FDECLAREREGION ) B ON T1.GUID = B.DISTRICTID WHERE CITY IS NOT NULL AND COUNTY IS NOT NULL}'; END;

BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'/CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW SPF_V_FMAIN AS SELECT (SELECT S.NAME FROM CODE_T_FIRAGENCY S WHERE S.GUID = A.FIRAGENCYID) FIRAGENCYNAME, A.SPFID, A.SPFNAME SPFNAME, A.SPFNAME || '{' || A.SPFID || '}' SPFGROUP_NAME, (SELECT S.NAME FROM CODE_T_SP_TYPE S WHERE S.GUID = A.PROJTYPEID) SNAME_PROJTYPEID, A.SPFCODE, A.AGENCYID, (select '[' || AGENCY.CODE || ']' || AGENCY.NAME from code_t_firagency AGENCY where a.AGENCYID = AGENCY.GUID ) AGENCYNAME, A.BEGINYEAR, A.ENDYEAR, A.EXPFUNCID, (SELECT ACCT.CODE FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF ACCT WHERE ACCT.GUID = A.EXPFUNCID) EXPFUNCCODE, (SELECT ACCT.NAME FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF ACCT WHERE ACCT.GUID = A.EXPFUNCID) EXPFUNCNAME, A.CREATETIME, A.SETUPSTATUS, A.PROJTYPEID, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.CTRLNUM, 0)) FROM SPF_T_FFOUDCONTROL B WHERE B.SPFID = A.SPFID), 0) CTRLNUMS, CASE (SELECT DISTINCT (LEVELNO) FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF T WHERE CODE LIKE '2%' AND GUID = EXPFUNCID) WHEN 3 THEN (SELECT SUPERGUID FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF WHERE GUID = EXPFUNCID) ELSE (SELECT SUPERGUID FROM CODE_T_ACCTITEM_SPF WHERE YEAR = GLOBAL_MULTYEAR_CZ.SECU_F_GLOBAL_PARM('YEAR') AND GUID = (SELECT SUPERGUID FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF WHERE GUID = EXPFUNCID)) END AS EXPFUNCID2, (SELECT V.LEICODENAME FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF V WHERE V.GUID = A.EXPFUNCID) EXPFUNCCLASS, A.FIRAGENCYID, A.DEPTID, (SELECT NAME FROM CODE_T_DEPT_SPF WHERE GUID= A.DEPTID) SNAME_DEPTID, A.DISTRICTID, A.ISPUBSHOW, A.ISRELEASE, A.APPLYPRJEFM, A.APPROVALTYPE, A.ISGROVPROC, A.FUNDLEVEL, A.FUNDMANAGE, A.ISTEMP, A.DATAKEY, A.DBVERSION, A.STATUS FROM SPF_T_FBASEINFO A/'; END;

BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'{CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW SPF_V_ININDEX_PINVESTPLAN AS select i.PROJECTID, (case when i.dbversion>=a1.dbversion then i.dbversion else a1.dbversion end ) AS DBVERSION, i.DATAKEY, i.EXPECOID, i.FINYEAR, i.ADDINDEXNUM AMOUNT, '1' dealtype, i.status, a1.PROJNAME, a1.PROJCODE, a1.AGENCYID, b1.DISTRICTID, i.EXPFUNCID, b1.SPFID, b1.DEPTID, pt.PROJTYPE from p#Spf_t_Pinvestplan i, p#spf_t_pbaseinfo a1, p#spf_t_fbaseinfo b1, p#SPF_T_PROJECTTYPE pt where i.ISPLANVALID = '1' and i.PROJECTID = a1.PROJECTID and a1.SPFID = b1.SPFID and b1.PROJTYPEID = pt.PROJTYPEID and i.ISADJUST='1' and a1.ISINDEX = '1'}'; END;

BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'/CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW SPF_V_PAUDITMAIN AS SELECT A.DATAKEY, (SELECT AG.NAME FROM CODE_T_AGENCY_SPF AG WHERE AG.GUID=A.AGENCYID) AS REPORTAGENCY, A.AGENCYID, F.FIRAGENCYID, AGENCY.NAME AGENCYNAME, A.SPFID, A.PROJTYPEID, F.SPFNAME, A.PROJECTID, A.PROJCODE, A.PROJNAME PROJNAME, A.PROJNAME||'{'||A.PROJECTID||'}' PROJGROUP_NAME, (SELECT ACCT.NAME FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF ACCT WHERE ACCT.GUID = a.EXPFUNCID) AS EXPFUNCCLASS, --A.STARTTIME, --A.ENDTIME, --A.CHARGER, --A.CHARGERPHONE, A.CREATEUSER, A.CREATETIME, NVL(A.UPSTATUS,'0') UPSTATUS, A.UPTIME, A.IMPORTANCE, A.DISTRICTID, A.ISBGT, NVL(A.CHECKSTATUS,'0') CHECKSTATUS, A.PROJAUDITINGSTATUS, A.ISINSTEAD, A.ISPLANDOWN, -- A.ISBUDGETDOWN, A.ISTEMP, A.TEMPDEPTID, A.TEMPFIRAGENCYID, A.TEMPCHECKSTATUS, A.TEMPUPSTATUS, A.TEMPUPTIME, F.FUNDLEVEL, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.YX, 0)) FROM SPF_T_PINVESTPLAN B WHERE B.PROJECTID = A.PROJECTID), 0) YX, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.ZYJJWY, 0)) FROM SPF_T_PINVESTPLAN B WHERE B.PROJECTID = A.PROJECTID), 0) ZYJJWY, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.QTZJ, 0)) FROM SPF_T_PINVESTPLAN B WHERE B.PROJECTID = A.PROJECTID), 0) QTZJ, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.APPLYNUM, 0)) FROM SPF_T_PINVESTPLAN B WHERE B.PROJECTID = A.PROJECTID), 0) APPLYNUM, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.COUNTYAGNUM, 0)) FROM SPF_T_PINVESTPLAN B WHERE B.PROJECTID = A.PROJECTID), 0) COUNTYAGNUM, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.COUNTYNUM, 0)) FROM SPF_T_PINVESTPLAN B WHERE B.PROJECTID = A.PROJECTID), 0) COUNTYNUM, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.CITYAGNUM, 0)) FROM SPF_T_PINVESTPLAN B WHERE B.PROJECTID = A.PROJECTID), 0) CITYAGNUM, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.CITYNUM, 0)) FROM SPF_T_PINVESTPLAN B WHERE B.PROJECTID = A.PROJECTID), 0) CITYNUM, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.PROVAGNUM, 0)) FROM SPF_T_PINVESTPLAN B WHERE B.PROJECTID = A.PROJECTID), 0) PROVAGNUM, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.PROVNUM, 0)) FROM SPF_T_PINVESTPLAN B WHERE B.PROJECTID = A.PROJECTID), 0) PROVNUM, F.EXPFUNCID, A.DBVERSION, A.STATUS FROM SPF_T_PBASEINFO A ,CODE_T_FIRAGENCY AGENCY, SPF_T_FBASEINFO F WHERE F.FIRAGENCYID = AGENCY.GUID AND A.SPFID = F.SPFID/'; END;

BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'/CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW SPF_V_PMAIN AS SELECT A.DATAKEY, A.AGENCYID, F.FIRAGENCYID, (SELECT NAME FROM CODE_T_FIRAGENCY AGENCY WHERE F.FIRAGENCYID = AGENCY.GUID)AGENCYNAME, A.SPFID, A.PROJTYPEID, F.SPFNAME, A.PROJECTID, A.PROJCODE, A.PROJNAME PROJNAME, A.PROJNAME||'{'||A.PROJECTID||'}' PROJGROUP_NAME, (SELECT ACCT.NAME FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF ACCT WHERE ACCT.GUID = a.EXPFUNCID) AS EXPFUNCCLASS, A.CREATEUSER, A.CREATETIME, NVL(A.UPSTATUS,'0') UPSTATUS, A.UPTIME, A.IMPORTANCE, A.DISTRICTID, A.ISBGT, A.ISINDEX, NVL(A.CHECKSTATUS,'0') CHECKSTATUS, A.PROJAUDITINGSTATUS, A.ISINSTEAD, A.ISPLANDOWN, F.FUNDLEVEL, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.APPLYNUM, 0)) FROM SPF_T_PINVESTPLAN B WHERE B.PROJECTID = A.PROJECTID), 0) APPLYNUM, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.COUNTYAGNUM, 0)) FROM SPF_T_PINVESTPLAN B WHERE B.PROJECTID = A.PROJECTID), 0) COUNTYAGNUM, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.COUNTYNUM, 0)) FROM SPF_T_PINVESTPLAN B WHERE B.PROJECTID = A.PROJECTID), 0) COUNTYNUM, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.CITYAGNUM, 0)) FROM SPF_T_PINVESTPLAN B WHERE B.PROJECTID = A.PROJECTID), 0) CITYAGNUM, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.CITYNUM, 0)) FROM SPF_T_PINVESTPLAN B WHERE B.PROJECTID = A.PROJECTID), 0) CITYNUM, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.PROVAGNUM, 0)) FROM SPF_T_PINVESTPLAN B WHERE B.PROJECTID = A.PROJECTID), 0) PROVAGNUM, NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(B.PROVNUM, 0)) FROM SPF_T_PINVESTPLAN B WHERE B.PROJECTID = A.PROJECTID), 0) PROVNUM, F.EXPFUNCID, a.ISTEMP, f.DISTRICTID Spf_districtid, a.TEMPCHECKSTATUS, a.TEMPUPSTATUS, A.DBVERSION, A.STATUS FROM SPF_T_PBASEINFO A , SPF_T_FBASEINFO F WHERE A.SPFID = F.SPFID
--修改SPF_V_PMAIN/'; END;

BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'{CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW SPF_V_PROJPUBLICTY AS SELECT STP.DATAKEY DATAKEY, STP.PROJECTID, STP.PROJCODE, (STP.PROJNAME||'{'|| STP.PROJECTID) PROJGROUP_NAME , STP.PROJNAME, STP.STARTYEAR, STP.ENDYEAR, STP.PROJTYPEID, STP.ISPUBSHOW, STP.CHECKSTATUS, STP.PUBLICITYBATCHID, STF.SPFID, STF.SPFNAME, (SELECT ACCT.NAME FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF ACCT WHERE ACCT.GUID = STF.EXPFUNCID) AS EXPFUNCCLASS, AGENCY.GUID AGENCYID, STF.DEPTID, STF.FIRAGENCYID, AGENCY.NAME AGENCYNAME, AGENCY.DISTRICTID ADMDIVID, STF.ISPUBSHOW FISPUBSHOW, STF.DISTRICTID FROM SPF_T_PBASEINFO STP,SPF_T_FBASEINFO STF,CODE_T_AGENCY_SPF AGENCY WHERE STP.SPFID = STF.SPFID AND STP.AGENCYID = AGENCY.GUID AND STP.ISPUBSHOW='1' AND STP.CHECKSTATUS='1'}'; END;

BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'/CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW SPF_V_PSPFCHOOSE AS SELECT T.DATAKEY, A.NAME AGENCYNAME, (SELECT S.NAME FROM CODE_T_SP_TYPE S WHERE S.GUID = T.PROJTYPEID) PROJTYPENAME, T.SPFNAME SPFNAME, T.SPFNAME || '{' || T.SPFID || '}' SPFGROUP_NAME, T.SPFCODE, T.SPFID, A.NAME FIRAGENCYNAME, T.PROJTYPEID, (SELECT D.NAME FROM CODE_T_DISTRICT D WHERE D.GUID = A.DISTRICTID) DISTRICTNAME, T.DECLRANGE, T.SETUPSTATUS, T.APPLYPRJEFM, T.FUNDMANAGE, T.APPROVALTYPE, T.ISPUBSHOW, T.EXPFUNCID, (SELECT P.NAME FROM CODE_V_ACCTCODE_OUT_SPF P WHERE P.GUID = T.EXPFUNCID) SNAME_EXPFUNCID, T.ISRELEASE, T.ISGROVPROC, T.APPLYINNER, T.ISTEMP, T.DISTRICTID, CASE WHEN (to_number(replace(T.CUTOFFTIME, '-', '')) - to_number(to_char(SYSDATE, 'MMDD'))) >= 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ISOVERTIME, oa.title as docName, oa.docid as destdocId FROM SPF_T_FBASEINFO T, CODE_T_FIRAGENCY A, (select distinct t1.docid, t1.title, s1.TASKID from hqoa_t_docbgtrelation t1, spf_t_oarelation s1 where t1.docId = s1.DOCID and s1.TASKTYPE = '0') oa WHERE T.FIRAGENCYID = A.GUID AND nvl(T.FUNDMANAGE, '1') <> '2' and oa.taskid = t.SPFID order by oa.title/'; END;

BEGIN EXECUTE IMMEDIATE Q'/CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW SPF_V_PSTAMAIN AS SELECT A.DATAKEY, A.AGENCYID, F.FIRAGENCYID, A.SPFID, A.PROJTYPEID, A.PROJECTID, A.PROJCODE, A.PROJNAME PROJNAME, A.PROJNAME || '{' || A.PROJECTID || '}' PROJGROUP_NAME, A.DISTRICTID, F.EXPFUNCID, F.DEPTID FROM SPF_T_PBASEINFO A inner join SPF_T_FBASEINFO F on A.SPFID = F.SPFID inner join CODE_T_FIRAGENCY AGENCY on F.FIRAGENCYID = AGENCY.GUID/'; END;
